# playerViewControllerDidEndDismissalTransition(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the player view controller ends its dismissal transition.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func playerViewControllerDidEndDismissalTransition(_ playerViewController: AVPlayerViewController)
```

## Parameters

- **playerViewController**: The player view controller.

## Dismissing the Player View Controller

- **playerViewControllerShouldDismiss(_:)**: Asks the delegate object whether the player view controller dismisses itself upon request.
- **playerViewControllerWillBeginDismissalTransition(_:)**: Tells the delegate when the player view controller is about to start its dismissal transition.
